mapper.sql:
a.id, a.create_date as 'createDate', a.create_user as createUser, a.update_date as 'updateDate', a.update_user as updateUser, a.delete_flag as deleteFlag, a.remark,
a.exception_detail as exceptionDetail, a.interface_name as interfaceName, a.ip, a.log_type as logType, a.method_name as methodName, a.params, a.time, a.user_id as userId, a.link
